title: Is there a way to directly set up a speed dial number on the dial pad like w. other phones?
content: On all other phones you can simply add one or two digits on the keypad to quickly dial a number. Normally  "1"  is programmed to call voicemail.  You can then assign other digits to speed dial home, office, etc.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
